about_the_game:
Fearful Thanata, bringing the death on Her wings...
Instilling the fear into mortal, living creatures,
She's merciless, can't be tamed,
The sun will never look on this leaden skin...
But will you look?

Treis Zoes (from the Greek "Three Lives") is a gothic visual novel, set in the world of living skeletons. The main character is a girl named Evanny and a really big adventure awaits her.
What kind of fate awaits her? What events will happen in her adventure? It's all up to you. We offer you three endings with different ways of accesing them.
You can never guess the consequences of a seemingly insignificant choice.

Our story isn't going to tell just about Evanny's story, but also about various and different, unique worlds. We will tell you about unknown places, about the life of humanlike beings and about what makes them special. And all of this is also portrayed in a beautiful gothic artstyle, that combines with the original soundtrack.
In the demo, you will spend a day in Regency era Manchester: visit the opening of the first railway for passengers and one of the most terrifying slums of the 19th century – Angel Meadows. Spend the night at the cemetery surrounded by the invisible and mysterious entourage.
And in the end, find out if Evanny's courage is enough to fulfill the pagan sacrament, which will promise her a journey to the world of the dead.

Features? We have them too. Let's also summarize everything.
  • Original soundtrack made by
  • Gothic artstyle;
  • The story is influenced not only by the choice, but also by the motive of the choice;
  • Unique worlds, made from the scratch;
  • Interactive study of the world of the dead and the opportunity to explore the experience of past travelers
  • We are always welcome to talk with you and answer your questions!

And never worry, fortune favors the bold.

content_descriptors.notes:
There are scenes of violence and scenes with dead characters, depicted without censorship.
The text describes and discusses the themes of cruelty and death.
